description.en: Complete bathroom renovation in Glen Waverley with herringbone-pattern floor tiles, large-format matte wall tiles, fully waterproofed wet area, custom recessed shower niche, linear drain installation, and anti-mould grouting.
description.zh: Glen Waverley全面浴室翻新，人字铺地砖、大规格哑光墙砖、全面防水湿区、定制嵌入式淋浴壁龛、线性地漏安装，以及防霉填缝处理。
